cosmos.question: I am big and bright, and I shine in the day. But I'm not a lightbulb! What am I?

hints.text: 🔥 I am very hot.
💛 I give Earth light and warmth.
🌞 I am a star!

cosmos.question: I'm a big ball of rock that goes around the Sun, and I'm where you live. What am I?

hints.text: 🌎 I have lots of water.
🌱 Plants grow on me.
🏡 People live here

cosmos.question: I'm a bright object in the night sky, and I change shape throughout the month. What am I?

hints.text: 🌕 Sometimes I am full.
🐺 Werewolves like me.
🧀 People think I am made of cheese!

cosmos.question: I am a group of stars that make a picture in the night sky. What am I?

hints.text: 🐻 One of me looks like a bear
✨ I'm often named after animals or people
🌌 You can find me on a star map

cosmos.question: I'm a cold planet and the furthest planet from the Sun.

hints.text: 🌬️ I am very windy
🧊 I am named after a Roman God of the Sea
🌀 I am an Ice Giant

cosmos.question: I am a hot planet, the closest to the Sun.

hints.text: 🚀 It doesn't take long to orbit the Sun
🔥 I have extreme temperature swings
🌡️ I am named after a Roman messenger god

cosmos.question: I am a rocky and reddish planet, sometimes called the 'Red Planet'.

hints.text: 👽 Some people think aliens live on me.
🍫 I'm known for my rusty color.
🚀 Scientists send rovers to explore me.

cosmos.question: I am the biggest planet in our solar system with a giant red spot.

hints.text: 💨 I am made of mostly gas.
🔴 I have a famous storm.
🪐 I have lots of moons.

cosmos.question: I am a planet known for my beautiful rings. What am I?

hints.text: 💍 My rings are made of ice and rock.
💨 I am a gas giant.
🪐 I am the sixth planet from the sun.

cosmos.question: I am a collection of billions of stars, gas, and dust held together by gravity. What am I?

hints.text: ✨ Our solar system is part of me.
🌀 I can be spiral or elliptical.
🌌 I am a massive system in space.

bug.question: I have six legs and can fly. I love to buzz around flowers. What am I?

hints.text: 🌼 I collect nectar.
🍯 I make something sweet.
🐝 I say 'buzz'!

bug.question: I hop and jump all day long and chirp in grassy fields. What am I?

hints.text: 🎶 I make music with my legs.
🌱 I am often green.
🦗 I'm known for my jumps!

bug.question: I have many legs and spin a web to catch my food. What am I?

hints.text: 🕸️ I live in a web.
🕷️ Some people are scared of me.
🚶 I have more than six legs.

bug.question: I march in a line and carry food back to my hill. What am I?

hints.text: 💪 I am very strong for my size.
🏠 I live in a colony.
🐜 I work together with my friends

bug.question: I start as a caterpillar and then become a beautiful flying insect with colorful wings. What am I?

hints.text: 🐛 I go through a big change.
🦋 I am known for my beauty.
🌸 I like to land on flowers.

bug.question: I light up the night with my glowing bottom. What am I?

hints.text: ✨ I am bright in the dark.
🔥 I am not hot, but I glow.
🌃 You can find me at night.

bug.question: I hide in my shell and eat leaves, leaving holes everywhere. What am I?

hints.text: 🐌 I leave a slimy trail.
🥬 Gardeners don't like me.
🏡 I carry my house on my back.

bug.question: I make a buzzing sound near your ear, and then you get an itchy bite! What am I?

hints.text: 🩸 I like to drink blood.
🦟 I fly and bite.
👂 I am annoying around your head.

bug.question: I am small and red with black spots, bringing good luck when I land on you. What am I?

hints.text: 🔴 I'm colorful and round.
🍀 Some people think I bring good fortune.
🐞 I eat aphids that harm plants.

bug.question: I chirp at night, rubbing my wings together to make a song. What am I?

hints.text: 🎶 I create musical sounds.
🌙 My song is best heard when it's dark.
🦗 You hear me more than you see me.
